wikipedia_page.main: Rebecca Dulcibella Orpen (1830?-1923) was a 19th-century artist.  As she married twice, she is occasionally referred to as Rebecca Dulcibella Orpen Ferrers, Mrs Edward Henege Dering, or Rebecca Dering.

response: thumb|Edward Heneage Dering, portrait by Rebecca Dulcibella Orpen

In 1859 Dering married fellow author Lady Georgiana Chatterton. Dering converted to Catholicism in 1865Memoirs of Georgiana, Lady Chatterton (1878), p.152 From 1869, the couple lived at Baddesley Clinton with Georgiana's niece Rebecca Dulcibella Orpen and her husband Marmion Edward Ferrers.  While living there, they paid for improvements to the house and paid off mortgages taken out on the estate.
